fr.nspu.riot.api

Class DataDragonApi

  • fr.nspu.riot.api.DataDragonApi

  • public class DataDragonApi

    Creates and configures a REST adapter for DataDragon.

    Basic usage: DataDragonApi dataDragonApi = new DataDragonApi(endPoint, accessToken);

    Create instance of DataDragonApi with given executors.
